notes.text:
This update for bluez fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-27153: Fixed possible crash on disconnect (bsc#1177895).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: In BlueZ before 5.55, a double free was found in the gatttool disconnect_cb() routine from shared/att.c. A remote attacker could potentially cause a denial of service or code execution, during service discovery, due to a redundant disconnect MGMT event.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
